This specification defines APIs to access bluetooth application on Automotive device.

Summary of Methods

InterfaceMethod
BluetoothObject
Bluetooth void execute()

Introduction

본 API는 블루투스 전화 애플리케이션을 실행하는 기능을 제공한다.

Interfaces

BluetoothObject

Defines what is instantiated in the motor.application object.
There will be a motor.application.bluetooth object that allows accessing the functionality of the bluetooth module.
readonly attribute Bluetooth bluetooth

Bluetooth

Bluetooth interface.
void execute()
블루투스 전화 애플리케이션을 실행한다.
Signature
void execute()
Exceptions
MotorAPIError:
with error code NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR if this function is not supported.
							motor.application.bluetooth.execute();

Features

When the feature
  • http://hyundai.com/api/application.bluetooth
or any of the features hierarchically under that feature is successfully requested, the interface Bluetooth is instantiated, and the resulting object appears in the global namespace as motor.application.bluetooth.
This is the list of URIs used to declare this API's features, for use in the widget config.xml. For each URL, the list of functions covered is provided.

http://hyundai.com/api/application.bluetooth
Access to all the features in this module.
